        Checks if macaddress is already in the map
        Parameters:
        macAdd - MacAddress that is needed to be checked
        mappedMac - Map containing of Key : Named Group, Value : MacAddress
        Returns:
        TreeMap of MacAddresses mapped to their own specific group

        Get the map key from value
        Parameters:
        tm - TreeMap containing mapping of name and macAddress

        Returns:
        Key : MacAddress of TreeMap, returns null if macAddress not present as a key
